title: Fact Check: Quote attributed to Arbaaz Khan on his brother Salman Khan’s movies is false | Newsmobile
author: newsmobile.in
vclaim:
In the middle of the outrage against a section of Bollywood stars in the backdrop of Sushant Singh Rajput’s unnatural death, a quote attributed to actor Arbaaz Khan has surfaced on social media saying that ‘no Hindu organisation has the power to ensure Salman Khan’s movie flops’.

Hindus, do you accept this challenge?”)

The post is going viral and is being shared widely.

ALSO READ: Picture showing tricolour at Lal Chowk in Srinagar shared…

NewsMobile fact checked the above post and found it to be misleading.

We began our investigation by putting the above statement through a Google search, but we did not find any substantial report quoting Arbaaz making the above statement.

We further scanned through Arbaaz Khan’s official social media handles (Twitter and Instagram), but we did not find any posts resembling the above statement.

Hence, we can conclude that the above statement has been falsely attributed to Salman Khan’s brother Arbaaz Khan.

If you want to fact-check any story, WhatsApp it now on +91 88268 00707
